title: Marvel Rivals Version 20250110 Balance Post – Season 1 Begins!
summary: Summary of the patch with key highlights.

Vanguard.name: Captain America
changes: Reduce the delay time for shield restoration after releasing Living Legend from 3s to 2s.
Reduce Liberty Rush cooldown from 12s to 10s.
Reduce the energy cost for releasing Freedom Charge (ultimate ability) from 3400 to 3100; Reduce the additional health provided per second to self after releasing it from 110 to 100.

Vanguard.name: Doctor Strange
changes: Add damage falloff to Maelstrom of Madness and Gamma Maelstrom. Starting at 5 meters and reducing to 70% at 8 meters.
Slightly decrease the shield value recovery rate after releasing Shield of the Seraphim from 80/s to 70/s.

Duelist.name: Black Panther
changes: Reduce the additional health provided to self after refreshing Vibranium Marks with Spirit Rend from 40 to 30, and the upper limit of additional health provided from 120 to 75.
Reduce Hawkeye's season bonus from 20% to 15%.
Reduce Hela's season bonus from 20% to 15%.
